abstract: New York City police officer assigned to guard Mayor Bill de Blasio is shot in back by either pellet or BB gun outside Gracie Mansion, mayor's official residence; two people are detained, but no charges filed.
lead_paragraph: The police detained two people in connection with the shooting outside Gracie Mansion. Mayor Bill de Blasio and his family had not been in any danger, the police said.

headline.main: Member of De Blasio’s Protective Detail Hit by Pellet or BB
headline.print_headline: Member of de Blasio’s Security Team Hit With Pellet

snippet: The police detained two people in connection with the shooting outside Gracie Mansion. Mayor Bill de Blasio and his family had not been in any danger, the police said.
